dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 09, 2006 12:49 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; steve@awbs.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed
Date: Sun, 8 Jan 2006 23:21:42 -0500
From: <steve@awbs.com>
Reply-To: steve@awbs.com
Organization: AWBS
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

See this link:
http://www.tecniconline.com.ar/post-8333.html&sid=4a850b754afcd8422fd7a73693
a8b05d

All software is located at scripts.wmtrader.com.

Pinging wmtrader.com [69.93.102.178] with 32 bytes of data:

Owner of wmtrader.com is hosting on a theplanet server, with dns pointing to
the pirated software.
Links to other illegal activities are on the www.wmtrader.com forums.

Please remove this site and its dns entries.



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDwrAZvK/XpJs6oyURAix0AKCBFqspsWAyJMpyJ/mlWOscA5YHyQCeNPk5
m+wW3SKeaM7C115tXf1ijXA=
=ytV0
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
